fr.upem.captcha

Class Logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upem.captcha.Logic

  • public class Logic
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which manages the overall logic of the application ie moving in the images tree hierarchy, and setting up images to display

      set a random category of images to display (motherCategory) and a sub-category of images to pick (trueCategory)

      set the array of images to display in function of the current categories
